ygData.subject: SV: Leatherskin spell
ygData.msgSnippet: I wouldnt hunt without it, makes you survive those extra seconds so that the tank can get the MOBs of you! /Askur Wizard of Veeshan ... From: Gregory Egan
ygData.messageBody:
I wouldnt hunt without it, makes you survive those extra seconds so that the tank can get the MOBs of you!


/Askur Wizard of Veeshan


----- Original Message -----
From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, September 05, 1999 2:23 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Leatherskin spell


> From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
>
> Recently made level 24 and was wondering whether or not to buy leatherskin
> spell. Has anyone else found this spell useful? The bloodstone component is
> over 5 gp each, so it can become expensive to use it often.
>
> Greg (Kronan on Innoruuk)
